lead_paragraph: A swimming instructor is accused of inappropriately touching a child, and battle lines are drawn among his colleagues and parents.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Virus of Fear,’ a Kiss Touches Off Child Abuse Accusations
headline.main: Review: ‘Virus of Fear,’ a Kiss Touches Off Child Abuse Accusations

snippet: A swimming instructor is accused of inappropriately touching a child, and battle lines are drawn among his colleagues and parents.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie Virus of Fear, directed by Ventura Pons.
